subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Budenholzer, the next coach of the Atlanta Hawks, is the latest Spurs assistant to enhance his career under the tutelage of Coach Gregg Popovich and General Manager R. C. Buford.
snippet: Mike Budenholzer, the next coach of the Atlanta Hawks, is the latest Spurs assistant to enhance his career under the tutelage of Coach Gregg Popovich and General Manager R. C. Buford.
